text:
#BREAKING: A shot AND cash?

I just confirmed a statewide “inmate incentive” program is offering inmates $25 a piece if they get the #COVID19 #vaccine in prison. 

Where does the money come from? 

How do people outside of prison feel about this? 

See my story at 6 on @KDKA https://t.co/YnNVBlRVOC
